results.title: Image Resizer utility for Windows - PowerToys
results.description: Resize images in bulk with PowerToys Image Resizer utility. Learn how to quickly resize multiple images using this Windows shell extension with drag-and-drop support.

descriptions.content: Resize images in bulk with PowerToys Image Resizer utility.
Learn how to quickly resize multiple images using this Windows shell extension with drag-and-drop support.

results.title: DISM Operating System Package (.cab or .msu) Servicing Command-Line Options
results.description: DISM Operating System Package (.cab or .msu) Servicing Command-Line Options

descriptions.content: Note Using this command to remove a package from an offline image will not reduce the image size.
/PackageName is a package in an image.
Examples: /Cleanup-Image Performs cleanup or recovery operations on the image.
